text: Magnus J. Wenninger (October 31, 1919 - February 17, 2017) was an American mathematician. He worked on constructing polyhedron models. He also wrote the first book on their construction. He was also a Benedictine monk. He was born in Park Falls, Wisconsin. His parents were German. Wenninger died on February 17, 2017 at Saint John's Abbey in Collegeville, Minnesota. He was 97. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American mathematicians Category:Benedictines Category:People from Wisconsin
title: Magnus Wenninger
